text: @chrislhayes Perfect. Democrats are lying and attempting to panic the populace because of the Coronavirus. Especially in Congress the liars Adam schiff, chuck Schumer and Nancy Pelosi have not made any conciliatory effort to the republicans to work together. Not a good look for democrats.
